VEC.Q: How many stages are there in this funnel chart?

SRP.Q: Is the Event Announcement stage positioned above or below the Fan Engagement stage?
SRP.A: The Event Announcement stage is positioned {above} the Fan Engagement stage.

VPR.Q: What pattern does the data reduction follow in this funnel chart?
VPR.A: The data reduction follows a {logarithmic} pattern.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Merchandise Purchase?
VE.A: The value of stage Merchandise Purchase is {176}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Ticket Purchase?
VE.A: The value of stage Ticket Purchase is {884}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Fan Engagement?
VE.A: The value of stage Fan Engagement is {395}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the highest value is Event Announcement, with a value of {1374}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the lowest value is Event Reattendance, with a value of {146}.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Fan Engagement to stage Post-Event Feedback?
SC.A: Decreased by {158} Participants from stage Fan Engagement to stage Post-Event Feedback.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value exceed 1129? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall below 161? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall between 316 and 496? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage Post-Event Feedback to Merchandise Purchase, or from stage Event Attendance to Fan Engagement?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Event Attendance} to {Fan Engagement} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is the greatest: from stage Event Announcement to Ticket Purchase, from stage Ticket Purchase to Event Attendance, or from stage Event Attendance to Fan Engagement?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Event Announcement} to stage {Ticket Purchase} is the greatest.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the largest?
MSR.A: The largest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Event Announcement} and {Ticket Purchase} stages.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the smallest?
MSR.A: The smallest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Merchandise Purchase} and {Event Reattendance} stages.
